derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English lenge, probably from Middle Dutch; related to long.
Middle English: from Old Norse lyng, of unknown origin.

encyclopedia.content: Ling，男，广州人，本名李凌彪。1999年开始CG插画创作；2001年转入同人志创作；2002年1月起于杂志《Pop Gamer》每期连载四格漫画栏目；04年4月起于杂志《漫动作》少年志连载长篇故事《魔法超校生》。还为《Pop Gamer》、《Game Base》、《漫友》、《中国卡通》、《新快报》、《南方都市报》、《火神动漫网》等各类报刊杂志媒体提供插图海报。

means.word_mean: 1. water chestnut whose spiny fruit has two rather than 4 prongs
2. common Old World heath represented by many varieties; low evergreen grown widely in the northern hemisphere
3. elongated marine food fish of Greenland and northern Europe; often salted and dried
5. elongate freshwater cod of northern Europe and Asia and North America having barbels around its mouth
